details.resultText: Diana Taurasi Voted By Fans As WNBA's Greatest Player of All Time Official Release October 10, 2021 – Sue Bird, Maya Moore, Candace Parker and Cynthia Cooper Complete Top Five in "Vote for the GOAT" – NEW YORK, Oct. 10, 2021 – The WNBA announced today that Phoenix Mercury guard Diana Taurasi has been
